price: ߟߊ߬ߛߋ߬ߒ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߟߋ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߘߐ߫ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ߫ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ ߞߍ߬ߟߊ ߦߋ߫
arabic: إِنَّ فِي هَٰذَا لَبَلَٰغٗا لِّقَوۡمٍ عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna fī hādhā labalāghan liqawmin ʿābidīna
